title: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte
descriptions:
**Product Listing:**

**Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte**

Experience the ultimate in eyeshadow convenience and performance with the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in Putty Matte. This highly pigmented, matte-finish eyeshadow stick offers a range of benefits for beautiful, long-lasting results.

**Key Features:**

* Highly pigmented formula for vibrant, true-to-color results
* Matte finish for a natural, subtle look
* Crème-to-Powder formula for a smooth, blendable application
* Waterproof and crease-proof for all-day wear
* Suitable for delicate, sensitive skin
* Enriched with Vitamins C and E, and Candelilla Wax for hydration, nourishment, and antioxidant protection
* Improves skin tone and texture over time
* Built-in smudger for easy blending and smudging
* Brush-free application for convenience
* Blendable formula sets before formula sets for a flawless finish

**Product Details:**

* Shade: Putty Matte (with 30 shade options available in Matte, Shimmer, and Metallic finishes)
* Type: Crème-to-Powder Eyeshadow Stick
* Ingredients: Vitamin C, Vitamin E, Candelilla Wax
* Skin Benefits: Hydration, Nourishment, Antioxidant Protection, Environmental Damage Repair, Skin Tone Improvement, Texture Improvement
* Application: Smudger-included, Blendable, Sets before formula sets

**Get ready to experience the perfect blend of convenience, performance, and skin benefits with the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in Putty Matte. Order now and discover a world of beautiful, long-lasting eyeshadow looks!**

**Introducing the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in Putty Matte**

Get ready to experience the ultimate in eyeshadow convenience and performance with the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick. This innovative, highly pigmented formula combines the best of both worlds: the ease of a cream eyeshadow and the long-lasting power of a powder.

**Key Features:**

* **Highly Pigmented**: Rich, vibrant color that lasts all day
* **Matte Finish**: A soft, subtle finish that's perfect for everyday wear
* **Crème-to-Powder Formula**: Glides on smoothly and sets to a powder finish for long-lasting wear
* **Waterproof and Crease-Proof**: Resists smudging and fading, even in humid conditions
* **Nourishing Ingredients**: Enriched with Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Candelilla Wax to hydrate and nourish your skin
* **Skin Benefits**: Provides antioxidant protection, helps repair environmental damage, and improves skin tone and texture
* **Easy Application**: No brushes required! Simply sweep the stick directly onto your lids and blend with the built-in smudger or your fingers
* **Blendable**: Easy to blend and build for a customizable look
* **Set Time**: Blend before the formula sets for a seamless finish

**What's Included:**

* One Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in Putty Matte
* Built-in smudger for easy blending and application

**Shade Options:**

* Putty Matte (available now)
* 29 additional shades available in Matte, Shimmer, and Metallic finishes

**Why Choose Julep?**

* Suitable for delicate, sensitive skin
* Cruelty-free and vegan-friendly
* Long-lasting, high-performance formula
* Easy to use and apply

**Order now and experience the convenience and performance of the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick!**
